name: CommandsBuilder
desc: Constructs command sets from multi-expression closures. Like ViewBuilder, it supports up to ten expressions in the closure body.

items.name: static func buildBlock() -> EmptyCommands
items.desc: Builds an empty command set from a block containing no statements.

items.name: static func buildBlock<Content>(Content) -> Content
items.desc: Passes a single command group written as a child group through modified.

items.name: static func buildBlock<C0, C1>(C0, C1) -> some Commands
